org.haitao.common.widget

接口 HorizontalListView.OnScrollListener

  • 封闭类:
    HorizontalListView

    public static interface HorizontalListView.OnScrollListener

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      static int SCROLL_IDLE 
      static int SCROLL_TOUCH_SCROLL 

    • 方法概要

      Callback method to be invoked when the list has been scrolled or flown.

    • 字段详细资料

      • SCROLL_IDLE

        static final int SCROLL_IDLE
        另请参阅:

      • SCROLL_TOUCH_SCROLL

        static final int SCROLL_TOUCH_SCROLL

        另请参阅:

    • 方法详细资料

      • onScrollStateChanged

        void onScrollStateChanged( view,
                        int status)
        Callback method to be invoked while the list view is being scrolled or flown. If the view is being scrolled, this method will be called before the next frame of the scroll is rendered. if it's being flying, it will be invoked at flying finish.
        In particular, it will be called before any calls to android.widget.BaseAdapter#getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup).
        参数:
        view - The view whose scroll state is being reported
        status - The current scroll state. One of SCROLL_IDLE, SCROLL_TOUCH_SCROLL or SCROLL_FLING.

      • onScroll

        void onScroll( view,
            int firstVisibleItem,
            int visibleItemCount,
            int totalItemCount)
        Callback method to be invoked when the list has been scrolled or flown. This will be called after the scroll or fly has completed
        参数:
        view - The view whose scroll state is being reported
        firstVisibleItem - the index of the first visible cell (ignore if visibleItemCount == 0)
        visibleItemCount - the number of visible cells
        totalItemCount - the number of items in the list adaptor
